36.Name: Tune Strain Response
36.Desc: Gains total DMG increase from Tune Break Boost

Name: Luuk Herssen
Desc: Jiyan, leader of the <te href=850086>Midnight Rangers</te>, acts with swift and resolute righteousness. He possesses the formidable ability to conjure a powerful Qingloong from the winds, making him invincible on the battlefield.

Skill.Name: Such is Light
Skill.Desc:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
Hurl out a whirling blade on Stage 3, which disappears when Luuk Herssen casts other skills that can deal damage.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to jump into the air, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks in mid-air, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. Stage 4 is a Plunging Attack at the cost of STA.
<color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack</color> or <color=Highlight>Jump</color> to perform <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> Stage {0} and 3 in mid-air.
Luuk Herssen attacks with <color=Highlight>Scythe: Dissection</color> when the input is <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color>.
Luuk Herssen attacks with <color=Highlight>Scythe: Resection</color> when the input is <color=Highlight>Jump</color>. He also inflicts <color=Highlight><te href=100003>Tune Strain - Shifting</te></color> on the target hit for {1}s and reduces DMG taken by {3} for {2}s.
As the active Resonator, while in mid-air, this skill's cycle will not be reset.
While in mid-air, <color=Highlight>hold Normal Attack</color> to perform a Plunging Attack at the cost of STA.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
<color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack</color> right after a successful Dodge on the ground to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. <color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack</color> right after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color>.
<color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack</color> right after a successful Dodge in mid-air to flash toward the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. 
<color=Highlight>Hold Normal Attack</color> to perform a Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
<color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack</color> right after a successful Dodge to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.

7.Name: Mid-air Attack Stage 2 Scythe: Dissection DMG

8.Name: Mid-air Attack Stage 3 Scythe: Dissection DMG

9.Name: Mid-air Attack Stage 2 Scythe: Resction DMG

10.Name: Mid-air Attack Stage 3 Scythe: Resction DMG

Skill.Name: Reunion of All the Fallen
Skill.Desc:
<size=40><color=Title>Golden Reflux</color></size>
Flash toward the target and deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. Inflict <color=Highlight><te href=100003>Tune Strain - Shifting</te></color> on the target hit for 25s.
<color=Highlight>Golden Reflux</color> has 2 charges.
Can be cast in mid-air.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Aureole of Execution</color></size>
Casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color> or <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack Stage 3</color> replaces <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> with <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color>, which deals Basic Attack DMG and inflicts <color=Highlight><te href=100003>Tune Strain - Shifting</te></color> on the target hit for 25s.
<color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> has {0} forms, including <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution: Ring</color>, <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution: Breach</color>, and <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution: Glare</color>.
Casting any form of <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> grants <SapTag=1>{1}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=stack P=stacks SapTag=1} of <color=Highlight><te href=151001>Endnotes on the Endgame</te></color> and switches <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> to the next form in sequence.
Switching to another Resonator resets the cycle of <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> and <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> is reset to <color=Highlight>Golden Reflux</color>.
Can be cast in mid-air.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Aureole of Execution: Ring</color></size>
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, and reset the <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> cycle to Stage 1.
The next <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> triggers <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Golden Impale</color>.
<color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Golden Impale</color> is no longer available if <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> is cast in mid-air or Luuk Herssen is switched out in the duration.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Aureole of Execution: Breach</color></size>
Spin and dash forward, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> to enemies along the path and resetting the <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> cycle to Stage 1. Then, hurl out an <color=Highlight><te href=151004>Ichor Blade</te></color>.
The next <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> triggers <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Golden Impale</color>.
<color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Golden Impale</color> is no longer available if <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> is cast in air or Luuk Herssen is switched out in the duration.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Aureole of Execution: Glare</color></size>
Hurl out Solid-State Ichor, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and forming an <color=Highlight>Ichor Deposit</color> on the ground.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Golden Impale</color></size>
Flash toward the target and deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Ichor Deposit</color></size>
<color=Highlight>Ichor Deposit</color> detonates automatically after {3}s, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Endnotes on the Endgame</color></size>
Increase the DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Rewritten in Winter's Margins</color> by {4}, stacking up to {2} times. Casting <color=Highlight>Rewritten in Winter's Margins</color> or switching to another Resonator removes all stacks.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
<size=40><color=Title>Resonance Skill</color></size>
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and inflict <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Shifting</color>. The skill has 2 charges.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Enhanced Resonance Skill</color></size>
<color=Highlight>Enhanced Resonance Skill</color> becomes available right after casting mid-air <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color> or <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack Stage 3</color>, which deals <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> considered Basic Attack DMG, inflicts <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Shifting</color>, and increases Luuk Herssen's <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation</color> Skill DMG , stacking up to 3 times.
<color=Highlight>Enhanced Resonance Skill</color> has 3 forms, which rotate in sequence each time <color=Highlight>Enhanced Resonance Skill</color> is cast.

Skill.Name: Rewritten in Winter's Margins
Skill.Desc:
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
Can be cast in mid-air.
Skill.SimpleDesc: Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.

Skill.Name: Pulses Under the Snow
Skill.Desc:
When Resonators in the team directly damage and defeat targets, if the targets are affected by <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>:
- If Luuk Herssen has no Perpetuating Daytime, gain stacks of Perpetuating Daytime equal to the stacks of <color=Highlight><a href=></color>.
- If Luuk Herssen already has Perpetuating Daytime, and the target's stacks of <color=Highlight><a href=></color> exceed the current stacks of Perpetuating Daytime, increase Perpetuating Daytime's stacks to match the target's <color=Highlight><a href=></color> stacks.
- When Resonators in the team casts <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color>, if the target is affected by <color=Highlight><te href=100003>Tune Strain - Shifting</te></color>,  Luuk Herssen loses all stacks of Perpetuating Daytime, then apply equal stacks of <color=Highlight><a href=></color> on the target, up to the target's current <color=Highlight><a href=></color> stack cap. Cooldown: {1}s.
- Perpetuating Daytime stacks up to {0} times.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
Luuk Herssen reserves the stacks of <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Interfered</color> on the target when Resonators in the team defeat a target affected by <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Interfered</color>.
When Resonators in the team casts <color=Highlight>Tune Break</color> on targets affected by <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Shifting</color>, Luuk Herssen inflicts the reserved stacks of <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Interfered</color> on the target.

Skill.Name: Uncaused Diagnosis
Skill.Desc:
When Luuk Herssen deals damage to targets affected by <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>, every {0} points of <color=Highlight>Tune Break Boost</color> he has Amplifies this instance of damage by {1}, up to {2}.
After any nearby Resonator in the team inflicts <color=Highlight><te href=100003>Tune Strain - Shifting</te></color> on the enemies or deals <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> DMG, Luuk Herssen's ATK increases by {3} for {4}s.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
Luuk Herssen deals more damage to targets affected by <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Interfered</color> with higher Tune Break Boost.
After any nearby Resonators in the team inflict <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Shifting</color> or <color=Highlight>Tune Break</color> DMG, Luuk Herssen's ATK increases.

Skill.Name: Before Injection of Dawn
Skill.Desc:
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and hurl out an <color=Highlight><te href=151004>Ichor Blade</te></color> and inflict <color=Highlight><te href=100003>Tune Strain - Shifting</te></color> on the target.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack after this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack Stage 2</color>.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and inflict <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Shifting</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack Stage 2</color>.

Skill.Name: Spark from the Frost
Skill.Desc:
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color></size>
When the Solid-State Ichor of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution: Glare</color> is hurled out, <color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack</color> in mid-air to cast <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color>.
Slam down from the air to detonate the <color=Highlight><te href=151005>Ichor Deposit</te></color>, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> (considered Basic Attack DMG) and recovering all STA.
<color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color> is no longer available when Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Rewritten in Winter's Margins</color> is cast or Luuk Herssen is switched off the field.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Aureate Judge</color></size>
With full <te href=151002>Ichor Flow</te>, enter the <color=Highlight>Aureate Judge</color> state. In this state, Luuk Herssen gains the following effects:
- <te href=151002>Ichor Flow</te> does not restore. The DMG Multipliers of all forms of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> increase by {15}.
- Casting <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution: Glare</color> increases the DMG Multiplier of the next <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color> and <color=Highlight><te href=151005>Ichor Deposit</te></color> DMG by {15}.
- {1} points of <te href=151002>Ichor Flow</te> is consumed each time Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> is cast.
- <color=Highlight>Aureate Judge</color> ends when <te href=151002>Ichor Flow</te> depletes.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Golden Rule</color></size>
When Luuk Herssen is in the team, all other Resonators in the team gain Golden Rule. When Resonators with Golden Rule cast Outro Skill and the incoming Resonator is Luuk Herssen, remove all Golden Rules on Resonators in the team and grant Luuk Herssen {3} points of <te href=151002>Ichor Flow</te> and {4} points of Concerto Energy. Resonators in the team gain Golden Rule again after {2}s. This effect does not apply in Co-op Mode.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dawnlit Keep</color></size>
Luuk Herssen gains <SapTag=6>{6}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=stack P=stacks SapTag=6} of Dawnlit Keep when he stays out of combat for over {5}s or casts Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Before Injection of Dawn</color>.
Dawnlit Keep is capped at {7} stack. When damaged, consume <SapTag=9>{9}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=stack P=stacks SapTag=9} of Dawnlit Keep to reduce the DMG taken by {14} and gain immunity to interruptions for {10}s. This effect can be triggered once per second.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Radiant Reave</color></size>
When Luuk Herssen performs Dodge in mid-air, he briefly stays airborne and hurls out an <color=Highlight><te href=151004>Ichor Blade</te></color>.
Luuk Herssen consumes STA continuously while airborne.
If Luuk Herssen is launched into mid-air, <color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Dodge</color> before landing to trigger this effect, up to 3 times. When he is on the ground or switched out for more than {12}s, the trigger count is reset.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Ichor Blade</color></size>
Deal fixed <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG that is not affected by any DMG Bonus.
Only one <color=Highlight>Ichor Blade</color> can exist at a time. It cannot trigger <color=Highlight>Counterattack</color>.
<color=Highlight>Ichor Blade</color> cannot be launched without a nearby target.
<color=Highlight>Ichor Blade</color> disappears when Luuk Herssen casts other skills that deal damage.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Ichor Flow</color></size>
Luuk Herssen holds up to {0} points of Ichor Flow.
Normal Attacks, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Golden Reflux</color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Golden Impale</color>, and <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color> restore Ichor Flow on hit.
Casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Before Injection of Dawn</color> restores {13} points of Ichor Flow.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color></size>
After casting <color=Highlight>Enhanced Resonance Skill - Form III</color>, <color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack</color> in mid-air to slam down, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> (considered Basic Attack DMG).
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Aureate Judge</color></size>
Certain skills restore <color=Highlight>Forte Gauge</color>. When <color=Highlight>Forte Gauge</color> is full, the DMG Multipliers increase for all <color=Highlight>Enhanced Resonance Skills</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Golden Rule</color></size>
When other Resonators in the team cast Outro Skill and Luuk Herssen is the incoming Resonator, he additionally restores <color=Highlight>Forte Gauge</color> and Concerto Energy. This effect has a cooldown of {0}s.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dawnlit Keep</color></size>
Luuk Herssen gains {2} stack of <color=Highlight>Dawnlit Keep</color> when he stays out of combat for over {1}s or casts Intro Skill, which reduces DMG taken and grants immunity to interruptions for a time.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Radiant Reave</color></size>
Hurl out a whirling blade to attack when Dodging in mid-air, dealing fixed <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.

Skill.Name: Bow to the Last Light
Skill.Desc: Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> equal to {0} of Luuk Herssen's ATK.

Skill.Name: Silent Debate of Light
Skill.Desc: Luuk Herssen can inflict Tune Strain - Shifting on targets. Luuk Herssen can respond to Tune Strain - Interfered. When responding to Tune Strain - Interfered: For each stack of Tune Strain - Interfered on the target, each point of Luuk Herssen's Tune Break Boost increases his total DMG against the target by {1}. While Luuk Herssen is in the team, the max stack limit of Tune Strain - Interfered on a target is increased by {2}. When the target's Off-Tune Level is full, Luuk Herssen can cast Tune Break on the target.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
Luuk Herssen can inflict <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Shifting</color>.
Luuk Herssen can respond to <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Interfered</color>.

1.Name: Gold Kindled in Ash
1.Desc:
Luuk Herssen gains {0} <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> DMG Bonus.
The max stack limit of <te href=151003>Dawnlit Keep</te> is increased by {1}.
When in the <color=Highlight>Aureate Judge</color> state, casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> grants <SapTag=2>{2}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=stack P=stacks SapTag=2} of <color=Highlight>Dawnlit Keep</color>.

2.Name: Avalanche Roaring in Eyes
2.Desc:
The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Rewritten in Winter's Margins</color> is increased by {0}. This DMG Multiplier increase effect is stackable with that of <te href=151001>Endnotes on the Endgame</te>.
Inherent Skill <color=Highlight>Uncaused Diagnosis</color> is enhanced:
When Luuk Herssen deals damage to targets inflicted with <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>, every {1} points of Tune Break Boost he has now Amplify this instance of damage by {2}. This effect increases the DMG Amplification from {3} up to {4}.

3.Name: Spine Tempered by Golden Rain
3.Desc:
The DMG Multipliers of all forms of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> and <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color> are increased by {0} in the <color=Highlight>Aureate Judge</color> state. Casting <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution: Glare</color> increases the DMG Multipliers of the next <color=Highlight>Mid-Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color> and <color=Highlight><te href=151005>Ichor Deposit</te></color>.
Inherent Skill <color=Highlight>Pulses Under the Snow</color> is enhanced:
Perpetuating Daytime now stacks up to {2} times.

4.Name: Pulse Thrumming Under Rime
4.Desc: When a Resonator in the team deals <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> DMG, all Resonators in the team deal {0} more DMG for {1}s. This effect is unstackable.

5.Name: Through the Stillness of Snowstorm
5.Desc:
Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Before Injection of Dawn</color> and Outro Skill <color=Highlight>Bow to the Last Light</color> gain {0} DMG Bonus.
Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Golden Reflux</color> has its DMG Multiplier increased by {1} and Cooldown reduced by {2}s, and gains 1 more charge.

6.Name: Dawn Unfurling over Frostlands
6.Desc:
When Resonators in the nearby team deal <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> DMG, all forms of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color>, <color=Highlight><te href=151005>Ichor Deposit</te></color>, and <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color> deal {0} more DMG to the target for {1}s.
Each stack of <te href=151001>Endnotes on the Endgame</te> additionally grants Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Rewritten in Winter's Margins</color> {2} DMG Bonus, up to {3}.
When Luuk Herssen deals damage to targets inflicted with<color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>, the stack count of <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color> on the target is increased by {4}. This effect ignores the max stack limit.

Features: Luuk Herssen may switch between 3 forms of Enhanced Resonance Skill to deal substantial Basic Attack DMG.
By inflicting and responding to <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Interfered</color>, his Total DMG dealt is raised.
By utilizing the Tune Break Boost provided by other Resonators in the team, his DMG dealt is substantially Amplified.

151006.Desc:
Recover Ichor Flow upon casting Basic Attack, Heavy Attack, Mid-air Attack, Resonance Skill, Dodge Counter, and Intro Skill.
When Ichor Flow is full, enter the <color=Highlight>Aureate Judge</color> state.
In the <color=Highlight>Aureate Judge</color> state, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> gains DMG Multiplier increase. Each time it's cast, 100 points of Ichor Flow are consumed.

151001.Desc: Aureole of Execution: {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} {0}+{0}+{0}+{0} on the ground or {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} {0}+{0}/Jump+{0}/Jump in the air to activate Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color>. After the activation, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} {1} to cast Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color>.

151002.Desc: Golden Reflux: When Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> is not activated, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} {0} to jump to the air and flash toward the target.

151003.Desc: Heavy Attack: Hold {0} on the ground and consume STA to jump to the air.

151004.Desc: Mid-air Plunging Attack: Hold {0} or {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} {0}+{0}+{0}+{0} in the air to perform a Plunging Attack.

151005.Desc: Radiant Reave: {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Dodge in the air to perform a dodge. Hover in the air briefly while hurling a whirling blade to attack the target.
